entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Forestville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
